title: Psychosexual differences No. 2 (TEFC)
brief_description: Looks at the physiological and genetic origins of sexually differentiated behaviour. Jeffrey Grey talks about his research with rats and the kind of role reversals he can initiate by the manipulation of hormones.
description: Looks at the physiological and genetic origins of sexually differentiated behaviour. Jeffrey Grey talks about his research with rats and the kind of role reversals he can initiate by the manipulation of hormones.
